type.description: Corresponds to the native HTML <input> element's attribute. From dijit.form._FormWidgetMixin.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name used when submitting form; same as "name" attribute or plain HTML elements. From dijit.form._FormWidgetMixin.

alt.description: Corresponds to the native HTML <input> element's attribute. From dijit.form._FormWidgetMixin.

value.title: Value
value.description: Corresponds to the native HTML <input> element's attribute. From dijit.form._FormWidgetMixin.

tabIndex.title: Tab Index
tabIndex.description: Order fields are traversed when user hits the tab key. From dijit.form._FormWidgetMixin.

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: Determines if this widget should respond to user input. From dijit.form._FormWidgetMixin.

intermediateChanges.title: Intermediate Changes
intermediateChanges.description: Fires onChange for each value change or only on demand. From dijit.form._FormWidgetMixin.

scrollOnFocus.title: Scroll on Focus
scrollOnFocus.description: Determines if this this widget scroll into view on focus. From dijit.form._FormWidgetMixin.

showButtons.title: Show Buttons
showButtons.description: Show increment/decrement buttons at the ends of the slider.

minimum.title: Minimum Value
minimum.description: The minimum value the slider can be set to.

maximum.title: Maximum Value
maximum.description: The maximum value the slider can be set to.

discreteValues.title: Discrete Values
discreteValues.description: If specified, indicates that the slider handle has only 'discreteValues' possible positions, and that after dragging the handle, it will snap to the nearest possible position. Thus, the slider has only 'discreteValues' possible values.

pageIncrement.title: Page Increment
pageIncrement.description: If discreteValues is also specified, this indicates the amount of clicks (ie, snap positions) that the slider handle is moved via pageup/pagedown keys. If discreteValues is not specified, it indicates the number of pixels.

clickSelect.title: Click Select
clickSelect.description: Determines if clicking the slider bar changes the value or not

slideDuration.title: Slide Duration
slideDuration.description: The time in ms to take to animate the slider handle from 0% to 100%, when clicking the slider bar to make the handle move.. Default is registry.defaultDuration.

title.value: A form widget that allows one to select a value with a vertically draggable handle
